title: Food and Drinks 2
sentences: siempre me hace llorar cuando la corto.
The onion always makes me cry when I cut it.
en la salsa para dar más sabor.
Put a little garlic in the sauce to give more flavor.
es muy típico en las ciudades de la costa.
Seafood is very typical in coastal cities.
Can you pass me the salt and the pepper, please?
This food is very spicy and I need to drink water.
el agua antes de poner la pasta.
You have to boil the water before putting in the pasta.
I like to fry eggs with a lot of oil.
Do you want a chocolate cookie with the milk?
This dessert is too sweet for me.
Do you prefer red wine or white wine?
Waiter, can you bring me a very cold beer?
I put butter on the toasted bread.
para hacer la masa de la pizza.
I need to buy flour to make the pizza dough.
I put a spoonful of honey in my hot tea.
In summer I always eat a vanilla ice cream.
My mother made a strawberry cake for my birthday.
todos los ingredientes en este bol.
You have to mix all the ingredients in this bowl.
Can you cut the bread into small pieces?
la sopa para ver si necesita más sal.
I'm going to taste the soup to see if it needs more salt.
The waiter is going to serve dinner right now.
This soup is very salty; I can't eat it.
El café sin azúcar es muy
Coffee without sugar is very bitter.
I have a yogurt with cereal every day for breakfast.
Do you want a lemon soda with ice?
I really like pasta with tomato sauce.
